General.Name: SGT German Private Equity GmbH & Co. KGaA
General.Description: SGT German Private Equity GmbH & Co. KGaA acquires, fosters, and sells stakes in established businesses. The company operates through two segments: Asset Management and Investment. The Asset Management segment offers investments, value creation initiatives, and divestments for self-launched private equity funds in which institutional investors. The Investment segment is involved acquisition, holding, administration, and promotion of start-up company investments offered to support in sales, marketing, finance, and general organizational and management matters; and to support in the financing of portfolio companies. The company previously known as German Startups Group GmbH & Co. KGaA. SGT German Private Equity GmbH & Co. KGaA was founded in 2012 and is based in Frankfurt am Main, Germany.
